packages.process_filesÂ¶

This module contains functions to process free energy files produced by the PLUMED sum_hills command.

List of functions rename_profiles shift_to_zero

Functions

rename_profiles(path)

Function that reformats fes file names in order to get them read sorted.

shift_to_zero(path)

Function that shifts all fes profiles in the path to zero.
